DOC.brief_summary: A Study compare three different dos ProQuad concomitant administration M-M-R II PUVV ( Process Upgrade Varicella Vaccine ) vaccine .
DOC.brief_title: ProQuad Dose Selection Study ( V221-011 ) ( COMPLETED )
DOC.criteria: In good health Negative clinical history measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster Previous receipt measles , mumps , rubella and/or varicella vaccine either alone combination Any immune impairment deficiency Exposure measles , mumps , rubella , varicella , zoster 4 week prior vaccination Vaccination inactive vaccine past 14 day Vaccination live vaccine within past 30 day Immune globulin blood product administer past 3 month
